Description: Sherd of East Greek pottery lid or dish with flat-faced rim; buff clay wiith calcareous inclusions; row of regularly set holes through rim, made before firing. On edge if rim added red or dilute band between glaze bands; band on upper surface; on underside, band at edge of rim, glazed area to the centre.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GO.536)
